item.title: 就业数据不佳，交易员推迟美联储减息计划，国债飙升
item.description: 在一份美国劳动力市场报告低于预期后，国债大涨，交易员们加大了对美联储今年将多快开始降息的押注。【原文：Treasuries surged and traders ramped up bets on how soon the Federal Reserve will begin to cut interest rates this year after a US labor-market report trailed estimates.】

item.title: Vanguard 敦促投资者在美联储延期之际 "适当 "持有债券
item.description: Vanguard Group Inc.表示，美联储的降息步伐放缓，为投资者提供了更长时间锁定有吸引力收益率的机会，投资者应 "适当调整 "债券而非股票的配置比例。【原文：The Federal Reserve’s slowed path toward cutting interest rates offers an extended chance to lock in attractive yields for longer and investors should “right-size” their allocation to bonds over stocks, according to Vanguard Group Inc.】

item.title: 美国银行在欧洲招聘高盛和德意志银行交易员
item.description: 美国银行聘请了高盛集团欧洲贷款交易主管和德意志银行英镑投资级企业主管，以推动在欧洲的发展。【原文：Bank of America Corp. hired Goldman Sachs Group Inc.’s head of European loan trading and Deutsche Bank AG’s head of sterling investment grade corporates as part of a push to grow in Europe.】

item.title: 据说由 Glencore 支持的集团接近达成壳牌新加坡资产交易
item.description: 据知情人士透露，包括印度尼西亚PT Chandra Asri Pacific公司和嘉能可集团（Glencore Plc）在内的一个财团正在就收购壳牌公司在新加坡的资产进行深入谈判，交易价值可能约为10亿美元。【原文：A consortium including Indonesia’s PT Chandra Asri Pacific and Glencore Plc is in advanced talks to buy Shell Plc assets in Singapore in a deal that could be worth about $1 billion, people with knowledge of the matter said.】

item.title: 特斯拉股票高耸的人工智能估值脱离现实
item.description: 埃隆-马斯克（Elon Musk）希望人们只有在相信特斯拉公司能够制造出自动驾驶汽车的情况下，才会投资特斯拉公司。问题是，特斯拉的股价已经达到了假定该公司已经破解了这一密码的水平。【原文：Elon Musk wants people to invest in Tesla Inc. only if they trust it can make self-driving cars. Trouble is, the stock already trades at levels that assume the company has cracked that code, and then some.】

item.title: 博利登公司将在劳资协议达成后重开欧洲最大锌矿
item.description: 博利登公司（Boliden AB）在与工会达成协议，降低成本但裁员三分之一后，将于今年晚些时候重开爱尔兰锌矿。【原文：Boliden AB will reopen its Irish zinc mine later this year after striking a deal with unions that’ll reduce costs but cut the workforce by a third.】

item.title: 干旱加剧赞比亚经济困境，克瓦查继续下滑
item.description: 赞比亚货币对美元汇率连续第18天走低，巩固了其自3月份以来在新兴市场中表现最差的地位，因为严重干旱加剧了铜生产的限制。【原文：Zambia’s currency weakened against the dollar for an 18th successive day, cementing its position as the worst performer in emerging markets since March, as a severe drought added to constraints in copper production.】

item.title: 俄罗斯石油运输的热点地区突然荒无人烟
item.description: 希腊南部沿岸的一片水域曾是俄罗斯石油供应链中的重要物流枢纽，如今突然被蜂拥而至的油轮抛弃。【原文：A stretch of water off the coast of southern Greece that had become a pivotal logistics hub in the Russian oil supply chain has suddenly been abandoned by the tankers that had been flocking there.】

item.title: 七国集团对俄罗斯石油的价格上限问题重重
item.description:
莫斯科通过建立一支由油轮组成的影子船队，大大减少了对西方船只或服务的需求。【原文：

Moscow has dramatically reduced its need for Western ships or services by building up a shadow fleet of tankers.

item.title: KKR 利用资产支持债务为旗下基金注入更多资金
item.description: KKR & Co.及其高管在私募股权投资行业中的投资总额约为 250 亿美元，在投资自有基金方面处于领先地位。【原文：With commitments totaling roughly $25 billion, KKR & Co. and its executives lead the private equity industry when it comes to investing in their own funds.】

item.title: 摩根大通推出 IndexGPT，成为华尔街利用人工智能热潮的又一举措
item.description: 一年前，摩根大通公司（JPMorgan Chase & Co.【原文：A year after a wave of speculation broke out over its application to trademark the word “IndexGPT” in connection to an unspecified artificial intelligence-powered tool, JPMorgan Chase & Co. is finally unveiling the product that will bear the name.】

item.title: 因特萨银行利率超出预期，贷款和收费带来增长
item.description: 意大利联合圣保罗银行（Intesa Sanpaolo SpA）公布的第一季度盈利好于预期，原因是首席执行官 Carlo Messina 扩大了财富管理和保险收费，将其作为替代收入来源。【原文：Intesa Sanpaolo SpA posted better than-expected first-quarter earnings as Chief Executive Officer Carlo Messina expands fees from wealth management and insurance as alternative source of income.】

item.title: 印度储备下降，外国人从债券市场撤资
item.description: 印度的外汇持有量在 4 月下旬有所下降，这反映了在全球利率重新定价引发投资组合外流的情况下，印度官员为捍卫卢比所做的努力。【原文：India’s holdings of foreign exchange fell in late April, reflecting officials’ efforts to defend the rupee as global interest rate repricing triggered portfolio outflows.】

item.title: 迈克-阿什利的 Frasers 放弃在伦敦起诉摩根士丹利
item.description: 亿万富翁迈克-阿什利（Mike Ashley）在伦敦撤销了对摩根士丹利（Morgan Stanley）的诉讼，指控该投资银行追加 9.95 亿美元保证金是出于对这位零售业大亨的 "势利"。【原文：Billionaire Mike Ashley dropped the London lawsuit against Morgan Stanley that alleged a $995 million margin call the investment bank made was driven by “snobbery” against the retail tycoon.】

item.title: 开始一天生活所需的五件事美洲
item.description: 早上好。在重要的美国就业报告发布之前，苹果公司宣布巨额股票回购，其结果波及科技股。以下是市场动态。【原文：Good morning. Apple announced a huge share buyback and its results rippled through tech stocks ahead of an important US jobs report. Here’s what’s moving markets. — Sam Unsted】

item.title: 您的基金正遭受攻击贝莱德奋力击退萨巴袭击
item.description: 几天前，贝莱德公司（BlackRock Inc.信息中既没有公式化的语言，也没有通常这类声明中包含的难以捉摸的细枝末节。不，这是一个号召。【原文：A few days ago, BlackRock Inc. sent an unusual message to thousands of clients. It contained none of the formulaic language or inscrutable fine print typically packed into these sorts of statements. No, this was a call to arms.】

item.title: 拉巴纳品牌所有人普伊格在西班牙首次公开募股（IPO）募集 26 亿欧元后业绩大增
item.description: 西班牙美容和香水集团 Puig Brands SA 在首次公开募股中募集到 26 亿欧元（28 亿美元）资金，成为今年迄今为止欧洲最大的上市企业，随后该公司股价上涨。【原文：Spanish beauty and fragrance group Puig Brands SA shares rose after the company and its founding family raised €2.6 billion ($2.8 billion) in an initial public offering, in Europe’s biggest listing so far this year.】

item.title: 可可挥舞鞭子，为市场所见最狂野的一周画上句号
item.description: 可可期货大幅下挫，周跌幅仍有望达到近 30%，市场经历了有史以来最疯狂的一段时期。【原文：Cocoa futures whipsawed, while still on track for a nearly 30% weekly drop, as it wraps up one of the craziest stretches the market has ever seen.】

item.title: 欧佩克+可能需要在下月解决石油产能难题
item.description: 欧佩克+"下月召开会议时的主要问题是，是否将石油供应削减继续到下半年。但它可能还需要解决产能这一长期问题。【原文：The main question for OPEC+ when it meets next month is whether to continue its oil-supply cuts into the second half. But it may also need to tackle the longer-term issue of production capacity.】

item.title: 外汇收益减少，阿达尼绿色公司利润下降 70
item.description: 阿达尼绿色能源有限公司（Adani Green Energy Ltd.）表示，其第四季度利润比去年同期下降了 70%，而去年同期的汇兑收益曾帮助提高了盈利。【原文：Adani Green Energy Ltd. said its fourth-quarter profit dropped by 70% from a year earlier, when a foreign exchange gain helped boost the earnings.】

item.title: Ifo调查显示：德国缺乏作为商业中心的吸引力
item.description: 根据最新的 Ifo 研究所经济学家小组的调查，德国作为一个商业地点并不特别具有吸引力。【原文：Germany isn’t particularly attractive as a business location, according to the latest Ifo Institute Economists Panel.】

item.title: 安进加剧肥胖症药物竞争担忧，诺和诺德下滑
item.description: 诺和诺德公司（Novo Nordisk A/S）周五股价下滑，原因是一家美国竞争对手对一种试验性肥胖症药物的评论引起了人们对这一快速增长领域潜在新竞争的担忧。【原文：Novo Nordisk A/S shares slid on Friday as a US rival’s comments on an experimental obesity drug gave rise to concerns about potential new competition in the rapidly growing field.】

item.title: 鲍威尔对加息的反击可能让债券忘记糟糕的四月
item.description: 欢迎来到 "每周固定"（Weekly Fix），这是一份再也不打算加息的时事通讯。我是加菲尔德-雷诺兹（Garfield Reynolds），彭博社亚洲市场直播团队负责人。【原文：Welcome to the Weekly Fix, the newsletter that has no intention of hiking ever again. I’m Garfield Reynolds, Bloomberg’s Markets Live team leader in Asia.】

item.title: 今年多伦多购房旺季的关键时刻对买家有利
item.description: 多伦多传统的春季房市拉开了序幕，与去年同期相比，价格下降，新挂牌房源增加，有利于购房者。【原文：Toronto’s traditional spring housing market kicked off in favor of buyers as prices fell and new listings rose from the same time last year.】

item.title: 巴西遭遇多年未遇的零售业启示录
item.description: 零售业的大洗牌已经波及巴西，在亚马逊公司、MercadoLibre 公司和 Shein 集团有限公司等外国巨头的激烈竞争下，当地企业开始重组和整合。【原文：The retail shakeout has reached Brazil, where local players are starting to restructure and consolidate amid stiff competition from foreign giants like Amazon.com Inc., MercadoLibre Inc. and Shein Group Ltd.】

item.title: 挪威在克朗疲软之际为推迟降息敞开大门
item.description: 挪威中央银行表示，在克朗的疲软程度超出官员们的预期之后，它可能会推迟在秋季开始降息的计划。【原文：Norway’s central bank signaled it may delay plans to begin interest-rate cuts in the autumn after the krone weakened more than officials anticipated.】

item.title: 美银国际策略师哈特内特：美国就业疲软引发股市下跌风险
item.description: 美国银行公司（Bank of America Corp）策略师迈克尔-哈特内特（Michael Hartnett）认为，就业报告疲软将是滞胀信号，增加股市下挫的可能性。【原文：A weaker jobs report would be a stagflation signal, raising the odds of a selloff in stock markets, according to Bank of America Corp. strategist Michael Hartnett.】

item.title: 瑞银陷入困境，大石油公司回购：欧洲、中东和非洲地区未来一周财报
item.description: 瑞银集团股份有限公司（UBS Group AG）股票最近的大跌凸显了这家瑞士银行面临的挑战，即如何证明其对瑞士信贷集团股份有限公司（Credit Suisse Group AG）的收购是有坚实基础的。【原文：The recent selloff in UBS Group AG shares underscores the Swiss bank’s challenge to demonstrate its Credit Suisse Group AG acquisition is on solid ground.】

item.title: 业绩令人失望，帝亚吉欧任命新首席财务官
item.description: 英国蒸馏酒生产商帝亚吉欧集团（Diageo Plc）聘请 Nik Jhangiani 担任新任首席财务官，接替业绩令人失望的 Lavanya Chandrashekar。【原文：UK distiller Diageo Plc has hired Nik Jhangiani to be its new chief financial officer, replacing Lavanya Chandrashekar after a period of disappointing performance.】
